1.0.name: wordpress/page-management
1.0.description:
Page Management is a plugin that allows a sites' pages to be managed easily. "Page Management" allows admin users to:

  • Reorder pages and edit the page hierarchy using "drag and drop".
  • View all the sites posts or pages on the same page.
  • Allow admin users to hide subpages so they can see the pages more easily.
  • Creates an option to change the default view "Uploaded to this Post" in the media manager (making pictures/photos/images easier to find).
  • Creates an option to add a shortcode dropdown to Tiny MCE (so you can select your site's shortcodes from a dropdown).

Page Management hides the subpages when a page is being dragged. This means that you can't break the pagination by dragging a page onto one of its subpages and that moving a page with several levels of subpages is easy.

Page Management checks whether the admin user has edit page permission to only allow appropriate users to reorder pages.

Page Manag
